unnormalised: FYI, chemotherapy usually involves drugs like Cisplatin 100mg/m2, and radiation therapy often uses doses measured in Gray (Gy), e.g., 60Gy for certain tumors, administered at hospitals such as Tata Memorial Centre, Mumbai. Consult your oncologist for personalized advice.
normalised: F-Y-I, chemotherapy usually involves drugs like Cisplatin one hundred milligram per square meter, and radiation therapy often uses doses measured in Gray, for example, sixty Gray for certain tumors, administered at hospitals such as Tata Memorial Centre, Mumbai. Consult your oncologist for personalized advice.
